entry.title: Fallout from Azerbaijanโs Karabakh incursions continues

media:group.media:title: Fallout from Azerbaijanโs Karabakh incursions continues
media:group.media:description:
The fallout continues from Azerbaijanโs recent incursions into Armenian-controlled parts of Karabakh, which left two Armenian servicemen dead and 19 injured. The Artsakh Defence Army reported that, though the situation is now relatively calm, Azerbaijani forces did violate the ceasefire regime along some sections of the line of contact.

entry.title: Resetting the relationship between Armenia and the diaspora

media:group.media:title: Resetting the relationship between Armenia and the diaspora
media:group.media:description:
Tigrane Yegavian, an author and journalist, sat down with CivilNet to discuss the historical background of Armenia-diaspora relations and what opportunities were missed in the last (?) few decades. Yegavian also talks about how the media, politics and the education system can help narrow the gap between Armenia and the diaspora.

ิฑีตีฝ ึีกีถีซ ึ ึีจ ีดีกึีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีธีฒีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีฐีฅีฟึีกีถึีธีพ ีฌีกึีพีกีฎ ีงึ ีถีกึ ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีีกึีฟีกีฏีฅึีฟีซ ีทึีปีกีถีธึีดึ ิฑีตีฝ ีฏีธีฒีดีฅึีธึีด ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีจ ีฐีกึีพีกีฎีกีตีซีถ ีกีถึ ีคีกีนีธึ ีฉีผีนีธีฒ ีฝีกึึีฅึ ีง ีฏีซึีกีผีฅีฌ, ีธึีซ ีบีกีฟีณีกีผีธีพ ีฐีกีตีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีธีฒีดีจ ีฅึีฏีธึ ีฆีธีฐ ีง ีธึีถีฅึีฅีฌ ึ 19 ีพีซึีกีพีธึึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ึ ีฃีธีฝีฟีธีฝีซ 3-ีถ ึ 4-ีซีถ ีฅีฒีฅีฌ ีง ีีกึีฟีกีฏีฅึีฟีซ ีฃีตีธึีฒีฅึีธึีด ึ ีฆึีธึึีฅีฌ ีขีถีกีฏีซีนีถีฅึีซ ีฐีฅีฟึ

entry.title: Armenia ready to provide Azerbaijan passage to Nakhichevan, says Pashinyan

media:group.media:title: Armenia ready to provide Azerbaijan passage to Nakhichevan, says Pashinyan
media:group.media:description:
The situation on the line of contact in Karabakh was relatively stable last night and this morning, according to the regionโs authorities. Armenian defense officials also reported that a total of 19 servicemen were wounded in Azerbaijanโs incursions yesterday, in addition to two killed. Four sustained serious injuries, and one is in critical condition.
Yesterday, Azerbaijani units used drones, grenade launchers and anti-aircraft weapons in the direction of Armenian positions near the villages of Verin Horatagh and Yeghtsahogh. Baku claimed its troops captured a number of strategic areas near those villages as a result.
